data.eml:eml: Taxonomic notes on a collection of jumping spiders from Iran (Araneae, Salticidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dmitri V. Logunov (2010): Taxonomic notes on a collection of jumping spiders from Iran (Araneae, Salticidae). Bulletin of the British Arachnological Society 15: 85-90
